title: The Appraisal interview: 'How am I doing?' (NP)
brief_description: Designed to bring home sharply to the line manager the potential problems in failing to conduct appraisal interviews professionally. John Cleese shows shows that there is a logical technique and pinpoints the three most common managerial attitudes that can sabotage the appraisal interview. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
